original_text: When you made that idol, it was a sin that you did. So I took that gold calf and I burned it in the fire. Then I beat it into powder, like dust. I threw the powder into a stream that ran down from the mountain.
korean_text: 너희의 죄 곧 너희가 만든 송아지를 가져다가 불살라 찧고 티끌 같이 가늘게 갈아 그 가루를 산에서 흘러내리는 시내에 뿌렸느니라

sentences.original_text: it was a sin that you did
So I took that gold calf
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 그 금 송아지를 가져왔다

sentences.original_text: and I burned it in the fire
Then I beat it into powder
I threw the powder into a stream
that ran down from the mountain
